name: Intake Outake
description:
How to Play Controls

The four rows of plots each correspond to a key on your keyboard:

  • - QWERTY Keyboards:
    •  - 1st Row: 1 | 2 | ... | 9 | 0
    •  - 2nd Row: Q | W | ... | O | P
    •  - 3rd Row: A | S | ... | K | L
    •  - 4th Row: Z | X | ... | N | M
  • - AZERTY Keyboards:
    •  - 1st Row: 1 | 2 | ... | 9 | 0
    •  - 2nd Row: A | Z | ... | O | P
    •  - 3rd Row: Q | S | ... | L | M
    •  - 4th Row: W | X | ... | N | ?
  • - QWERTZ Keyboards:
    •  - 1st Row: 1 | 2 | ... | 9 | 0
    •  - 2nd Row: Q | W | ... | O | P
    •  - 3rd Row: A | S | ... | K | L
    •  - 4th Row: Y | X | ... | N | M

To harvest a plot, hold down the corresponding key for that plot.

Tips

- To make sure the feed meter at the top doesn't run out, try harvesting multiple crops at the same time.

- Crops go through 4 stages: Premature, Mature, Peak Maturity and Rotten. 

- You won't get anything useful out of Premature or Rotten crops.

- Crops at Peak Maturity ought to fill that meter real quick!

Credits Sound FX

- Kenney Interface Sound FX Pack

- Kenney Impact Sound FX Pack

Music

"Enchanted Valley" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
